intro: Thesion micromerium, commonly known as the lesser burnet, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Caryophyllaceae. It is characterized by its dense clusters of small, pinkish-red flowers that bloom in late spring to early summer. The plant has a creeping growth habit with numerous stolons and produces small, oval-shaped leaves that are typically covered in fine hairs. It thrives in dry, sunny habitats such as grasslands and rocky soils. Thesion micromerium is often found in temperate regions of Europe and parts of Asia.
